subject: Medicine
title: Cultural Differences in Placebos
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Cultural Differences in Placebos.

hook.text: The placebo effect is not the same strength everywhere.

buildup.text: Cultural beliefs about medicine shape how people respond.

discovery.text: Injections work better than pills as placebos in some cultures.

twist.text: In Germany, placebos for ulcers are unusually effective.

climax.text: In Brazil, placebo injections outperform placebo pills greatly.

quiz.question: How do cultural beliefs affect the placebo effect?
options: They change the strength and type of response
